alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:06PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 530 PM MST... At 406 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Sentinel, or 35 miles northwest of Ajo, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. Blowing dust with visibilities below 1 mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellton, Tacna, Sentinel, Paloma, Tyson, Dateland, Mohawk, Roll and Hyder. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 30 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert
